name: GateKeeper
description:
GateKeeper is a combat oriented 2D platformer. You play as an Indiana Jones- type adventurer trying to defeat Bosses in order to access the treasures in the temple. The game is a boss rush featuring Bosses with multiple forms, each with different attacks and tactics. The player has the choice between multiple different weapons, leaving how to defeat the bosses up to the player.

Can you overcome the Gatekeeper? Can you overcome what lies beyond?

This game was made as my final project for a game design class.
